contest-event.event-date:
June 29, 1889 D Hardraw Scar
Hardraw Scar 0 Entertainments Contest Hardraw Scar hardraw-scar
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Green Dragon Inn, Hardraw, North Yorkshire The first contest was for a Quickstep to be played in Hawes Market-place. which resulted as follows: 1st, £2, Besses o' th' Barn; 2nd, Leeds Forge Band.
Prizes: £25, £18, £10, £5
Jan. 3, 2012, 12:51 p.m. Jan. 29, 2013, 6:34 p.m.
1 Besses o' th' Barn Alexander Owen Faust [Berlioz arr. Owen]
2 Leeds Forge Edwin Swift Spohr's Works
3 Wyke Old John Gladney Jnr Weber Fantasia [arr. Gladney]
4 Wyke Edwin Swift Faust [Berlioz arr. Swift]
